channel.title: ESP3D on ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Recent content in ESP3D on ESP3D Ecosystem

item.title: Version 2.1.X
item.description: This version is the production version, features are frozen, only bugfixes are accepted. Firmware should work with the following firmwares: Repetier 1.0 Marlin 1.X/2.X Smoothieware 1.x grbl 1.x The communication between ESP board and target board is done by serial. The firmware must be used with ESP3D-WEBUI 2.X
